channel.title: Comments on: How to Upload Profile Video on Facebook [ 2022 Working Method ]

item.title: By: AOMIE
item.dc:creator: AOMIE
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://netmiko.com/upload-profile-video-facebook-working-latest/#comment-35">Law</a>.
This method is now not working for everyone. You should look for alternative methods.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Law.

This method is now not working for everyone. You should look for alternative methods.

item.title: By: Law

item.description: the profile video uploaded but didn't shows out in my profile
item.content:encoded: the profile video uploaded but didn’t shows out in my profile

item.title: By: AOMIE
item.dc:creator: AOMIE
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://netmiko.com/upload-profile-video-facebook-working-latest/#comment-33">Safal Magar</a>.
Try some other versions from here - https://m.apkhere.com/app/com.facebook.katana
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Safal Magar.

Try some other versions from here – https://m.apkhere.com/app/com.facebook.katana

item.title: By: Safal Magar

item.description: Hello, this version of facebook does not work in my mobile it is not install to open please send me please about my phone Realme UI version- V1.0 Android version- 10 Model- RMX1825
item.content:encoded:
Hello, this version of facebook does not work in my mobile it is not install to open please send me please
about my phone

Model- RMX1825

item.title: By: AOMIE
item.dc:creator: AOMIE
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://netmiko.com/upload-profile-video-facebook-working-latest/#comment-31">Shibly</a>.
It takes some time to process, for me it took more than 3 hours. Just leave it for some time and it should be fixed.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Shibly.

It takes some time to process, for me it took more than 3 hours. Just leave it for some time and it should be fixed.

item.title: By: Shibly
item.dc:creator: Shibly
item.description: the profile video uploads and shows here but gets removed automatically after sometime others cant see it
item.content:encoded:
the profile video uploads and shows here but gets removed automatically after sometime
others cant see it

item.title: By: AOMIE
item.dc:creator: AOMIE
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://netmiko.com/upload-profile-video-facebook-working-latest/#comment-29">Westley Fitzgerald</a>.
https://m.apkhere.com/down/com.facebook.katana_252.0.0.22.355_free
Here's one. If this also didn't worked then you might need to try some other versions from here - https://m.apkhere.com/app/com.facebook.katana
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Westley Fitzgerald.

https://m.apkhere.com/down/com.facebook.katana_252.0.0.22.355_free

Here’s one. If this also didn’t worked then you might need to try some other versions from here – https://m.apkhere.com/app/com.facebook.katana
